TopicTitle: How to Get into a circular orbit with stock parts! (HD)

Articles.Content:
[Kerbal Space Program Tutorial - How to Get into Orbit (HD)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uWDqRGpwqzA#ws)

This video will be showing you how to get into Orbit on Kerbal Space Program using stock parts only. It is a simple task that any 'Bottle Rocketeer' can eventually get the hang of. If you have any questions, comments or concerns, feel free to ask or express them below. I will do my best to help anyone with any problems they may have relating to this video or Kerbal Space Program.

Kerbal Space Program can be downloaded at: [http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/](http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)

Download link for the M-10 Orbiter CRAFT file:

[http://dl.dropbox.com/u/76061308/M-10%20Orbiter%20Tutorial%20Rocket.zip](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/76061308/M-10%20Orbiter%20Tutorial%20Rocket.zip)

In the spirit of a tutorial like this and at the request of someone here, I will be making a guide for bottle rocketeers that explains how to use the VAB and a basic breakdwon of the parts and things.
